name: GingerbreadHouseBuildHelper
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gingerbread house helper
des: Plays a video showing how to construct a gingerbread house. Assumes you already have the gingerbread house pieces. If not, you could make them out of graham crackers, or cardboard (although in that case it would be a cardboard house, not a gingerbread house).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
